sentences.en: A State Department spokeswoman said that the aid allocation for Pakistan was still under review.
sentences.cn: 国务院的一位女发言人说对巴基斯坦的援助配置仍在审核之中。

sentences.en: Abstract: The paper proposed a new method of tolerance allocation.
sentences.cn: 文摘: 提出了一种新的公差分配方法.

sentences.en: Allocation of invested funds between risk - free assets and the risky portfolio.
sentences.cn: 是指投资基金在无风险资产与有风险资产组合之间的配置决策.

sentences.en: Different loss allocation methods affect price in electric market.
sentences.cn: 电力市场环境下,不同的网损分摊方法对交易电价有一定影响.

sentences.en: During rationing we had a sugar allocation.
sentences.cn: 定量配给时期，糖是限量配给的。

sentences.en: For most people, active trading and asset allocation will disappoint.
sentences.cn: 对于多数人而言, 积极的交易和资产配置都将令人失望.

sentences.en: His sons quarrelled bitterly over the allocation of family resources.
sentences.cn: 他的儿子们为家产如何分配而吵得很凶。

sentences.en: Sugar is under allocation during war time.
The aid allocation for Pakistan was still under review.
sentences.cn: 拨给巴基斯坦的援助物资仍在审核当中。

sentences.en: the allocation of food to those who need it most
sentences.cn: 分配粮食给最需要的人

sentences.en: The city has already spent its allocation of housing funds.
sentences.cn: 该市已将其国宅基金配额用罄.

sentences.en: The whole question of the allocation of resources will come up for review next week.
sentences.cn: 有关资源分配的全部问题下周将被提交审核.

sentences.en: This requires an additional allocation of the impairment loss ( explained below ).
sentences.cn: 这需要损害损失的附加配置.

sentences.en: Timber is under allocation at present.
Town planning and land allocation had to be coordinated.
sentences.cn: 必须协调城市规划和土地分配之间的关系。

sentences.en: Traditional economics is concerned primarily with the efficient, least - cost allocation of scarce productive resources.
sentences.cn: 传统经济学主要是涉及稀缺生产资源耗费最少的有效配置.

sentences.en: Twelve hours a week seemed a generous allocation of your time.
sentences.cn: 一周12个小时，这好像占用了你很多时间。

phrases.tran_cn: 经费分配；预算分配；预算拨款
存储分配；分配内存；库容分配

trans.tran_en: the decision to allocate something, or the act of allocating it
